name: Agency,Mai?
description:
Delivering efficient, effective digital work for mid-sized companies and established NGOs, and on sub-contract from other agencies, Agency,Mai? focuses on quality of delivery and service, with a streamlined set of working processes that allow us to deliver the expected quality of an establishedÂ agency at a lower price.
Our focus is on web work (design, development and maintenance of corporate or product sites, microsites and pages, interactive infographics, calculators, etc.), often incorporating video, 3d renders, and multilingual content. Technically we focus on HTML5/JS/CSS3 coding and beyond-the-norm WordPress builds. Operationally we are set up to serve clients in the UK and eastern USA.
